pkgmetadata.longdescription: |travis|_ |coveralls|_ |pypi|_ |womm|_.. |travis| image:: https://img.shields.io/travis/wimglenn/oyaml.svg?branch=master.. _travis: https://travis-ci.org/wimglenn/oyaml.. |coveralls| image:: https://img.shields.io/coveralls/wimglenn/oyaml.svg.. _coveralls: https://coveralls.io/github/wimglenn/oyaml?branch=master.. |pypi| image:: https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/oyaml.svg.. _pypi: https://pypi.org/project/oyaml.. |womm| image:: https://cdn.rawgit.com/nikku/works-on-my-machine/v0.2.0/badge.svg.. _womm: https://github.com/nikku/works-on-my-machineoyaml=====oyaml is a drop-in replacement for `PyYAML <http://pyyaml.org/wiki/PyYAML>`_ which preserves dict ordering. Both Python 2 and Python 3 are supported. Just ``pip install oyaml``, and import as shown below:.. code-block:: python import oyaml as yamlYou'll no longer be annoyed by screwed-up mappings when dumping/loading.
